"Class Skill Trees":
"About Skill Trees

Here you can learn skills by investing the skill points (SP) you earn when leveling up.

Skills have levels, and each time you level them up, their effects become more powerful and you become able to learn even stronger skills.

Selecting \"Set Recommended\" will automatically assign SP to recommended skills. Use this if you are unsure what skills to learn.

[Link to Online Manual]
